critique: The document is a formal executive order. It aims to promote energy development while avoiding regulatory burdens. The language is formal and legalistic. There is a sense of determination and resolve to change existing policies. There is a focus on economic growth and national security. There is a desire to promote clean air and water, but also a focus on cost-benefit analysis. There is no strong expression of joy, sadness, fear, disgust, or surprise. The document is primarily focused on policy and action.
